TopicTitle: Do you think Aero Brakes need more heat tolerance now?

Articles.Content:
Landing gears heat tolerance is 2.7k. Aero brakes, who's purpose is to create more friction in the air, only have 1.2k heat tolerance. Before 1.0.5 I didn't have issues with them burning up, but now I do under the same conditions. It seems reasonable to increase the heat tolerance to at least 2k (i think 2.6-7 would be great) or we should add another kind of aero brake part that maybe weighs slightly more then the original but can withstand more heat or has build in ablators.
